alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 2:33PM EDT until April 05 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL GENEVA...NORTHWESTERN WALTON AND NORTHWESTERN HOLMES COUNTIES... At 133 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hartford to 9 miles west of De Funiak Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Eglin Air Force Base, Liberty, Coffee Springs, Oakwood Hills, Chancellor, Cluster Springs, Lytle, Darlington, Marl, Arrant Settlement, Geneva Municipal A/P, Glendale, Center Ridge, New Hope, Piney Grove, Somerset, Mossy Head, Leonia and Sand Hill. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for southeastern Alabama...and the Panhandle of Florida. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
